agreement.must_accept_terms: Before making use of the SIS Web Interface you must agree to the terms and conditions presented below. Please click "I accept" to indicate your acceptance.
agreement.must_accept_updated_terms: Terms and conditions for the SIS Web Interface have changed since you accepted them. Please review the version below and click "I accept" to indicate your acceptance.

buttons.revert_to_the_default: Reverts to the default map view.
buttons.send_instructions_to_all: Send instructions to all by email

charts.hover_or_tap_on: Hover or tap on charts to see caption.

confirmation.link_incorrect: Sorry: this confirmation link doesn't seem to be correct. Have you already confirmed your account? In that case you only need to sign in. If not, you can request another confirmation message.
confirmation.really_send_to_all: Send this message to all app users

confirmations.delete_account: Delete this account and all its apps and users?
confirmations.delete_app: Delete this app and all its contents?
confirmations.really_delete_account: You really want to delete this account and everything in it? There is no way to get it back.
confirmations.really_delete_app: You really want to delete this app and everything in it? There is no way to get it back.

errors.login_fail: Not recognised. Please check and try again

gotno.periods: No active periods have been defined.
gotno.person_types: No asset categories have been defined.
gotno.pois: No points of interest have been defined.
gotno.team_periods: No command schedule has been defined.

introductions.account_dashboard: Welcome to the SIS Web Interface. This is your account dashboard and home page. To reach one of your apps, please click the relevant icon below.
introductions.account_roles: Account roles are global: a permission granted here applies to all the apps in this account. You also can grant permissions at the app level for users who are only allowed to work in some apps.
introductions.account_settings: Here you can control the presentation of this account to its users.
introductions.account_status: You can use this view to disable or delete an account.
introductions.app_roles: Assign app roles to raise the level of access granted to a user in this app. This adds to the permissions already granted to that user. Changes take immediate effect but the user may need to sign in again.
introductions.app_settings: Here you control basic app presentation.
introductions.command_configuration: These settings control the behaviour of the Command library in your app.
introductions.developer_tools: A collection of downloads and settings useful in the development and release of your app.
introductions.dispatch_response: This is the package of information currently sent to the phones. If an etag and last-modified date are given then it will include only changes to the state that would have been dispatched at that time. Without them it includes every current object and deletion.
introductions.dispatch_status: The dispatcher renders content for delivery to your apps. For development and testing purposes you can monitor its output below.
introductions.evo_event: The SIS Control toolkit can bring in and display information about your Evocount zones and passages. To begin, please give your evocount event id.
introductions.images: This will be a master media list
introductions.init_package: This the initialisation state file for the app, taken directly from the dispatcher. It's a snapshot of the current dispatch state, omitting deletions that would not be relevant to a newly built app and including initial values for etag and last-modified. It should always include an admin block for app configuration.
introductions.intervals: These settings control the content-retrieval behaviour of the app.
introductions.issues: Here we would like to add a simple ticketer that can be used for bug reports, account support, all other enquiries.
introductions.locales: Here you can set the content locales of the app: that is, the languages in which messages and other material can be delivered.
introductions.mapping_configuration: These settings control the reporting behaviour of the Mapping library in your app.
introductions.message_configuration: These settings control the behaviour of the Messaging library and can be used to create a push notification connection between the SIS back end and your app.
introductions.nothing_to_see: Sorry: we cannot find anything that you are allowed to see. Please contact your account administrator to have your permissions checked.
introductions.password: Please use this form to choose a new password.
introductions.people: Assets are usually people but they can vehicles and other fixed and mobile resources.
introductions.person_types: Asset categories can include user roles as well as (for example) vehicle types and static assets.
introductions.security: These settings determine the security regime of SIS Web Interface users. They will expand to include password policy and permitted IP addresses.
introductions.sensing_configuration: These settings determine the behaviour of your app during a crowd-sensing session.
introductions.setup: Thank you for accepting our invitation. Before we go any further, please use this form to secure your account. Your password must be at least six characters long. Spaces are allowed and we recommend using several words.
introductions.welcome: Welcome to the SIS Control toolkit.
introductions.profile: This space will become more useful as we gather information about the user: frequently-visited paths, etc.

evo_alarm.upper_limit: Alarm triggered when zone load exceeds...
evo_alarm.lower_limit: and (optionally) stops when zone load falls below...

mfa.on_signing_in: Each time you sign in you will be asked for your password and the current authenticator code.
mfa.this_account_requires_twofactor: This account requires two-factor authentication but we notice that you have not yet set up an auth-gadget. Please install Google Authenticator or a similar app on your mobile device and then use the app to scan this barcode. Enter the resulting code in the box below to confirm the link.

account.suspension_notice: This text will be displayed at the top of the account dashboard page exactly as you enter it here.

agreement.agreements_global: Please bear in mind that these agreements apply to every team here. Changing an agreement or adding a new one will affect all our users.

app.any_component_or_environment_change: Beware! Any component or environment change will immediately change the license key.
app.battery_threshold: percentage battery level below which sensing is deactivated.
app.cdn_active: Allows detailed traffic monitoring, requires configuration of CDN service
app.demo: Some demonstration content will be generated for each visitor
app.evo_active: Evocount gates and zones are displayed on our map and alarms can be attached to them.
app.evo_event_attach: Press the 'connect' button to test your connection to Evocount and retrieve zone and passage definitions.
app.evo_event_not_found: Evocount event could not be found. Please check event id and try again.
app.key_management_changing: License key management is about to change so that component and and environment are not re-editable.

user.password: Your password must be at least six characters long. Spaces are allowed and we recommend using several words.

command.max_failed_team_uploads: failures before the asset stops trying to report.
command.max_team_upload_interval: seconds max between command status uploads.
command.require_pin: command users must authenticate with a PIN number.

notes.starred: Library items are presented when you click 'select', and are protected from deletion when not in use.

crowdsensing.max_failed_uploads: requests before we stop reporting locations.
crowdsensing.sensing_mandatory: If this box is checked then users will not be prompted to opt into crowd-sensing.

notes.latest_release_update_notes: Latest release update notes will appear here with links to older announcements.

mapping.map_statistics: If this box is checked then POI taps and other map actions in the app will be reported.
mapping.max_statistics_failed_uploads: failed requests before we stop trying to upload map statistics.

map.location_permission: Your browser may prompt for permission
map.map_historical: Each change of map state is added to the browser history.
map.map_persistent: When you come back your most recent view of this app will be restored.
map.map_zoomy: Selecting an object or collection causes the map to zoom to it.
map.set_default_map_view: Sets the default center and zoom level for the app.

message.deletion: Deleting this message will cause it to disappear from the control system and stop going out to new app users. It will remain on all the phones to which it has already been dispatched.
message.send_to_all: This message has no location; if you press "send to all app users", it will be sent to all app users everywhere.

period.smoothing: Smoothing makes sparse data more coherent but increases live playback lag.
period.blob_size: Larger blob size smooths the map but reduces detail, and also helps to reduce data size.

user.keep_password: Leave both fields blank to preserve an existing password.

agreement.notes: Changes in this version. This is optional: if present it is displayed in the updated terms dialog.

app.apns_cert_pem: The password you used when generating the APNS certificate

category.name: Category name
category.description: Description or notes for UI use

channel.name: Channel name
channel.description: Description or notes for UI use

evo_alarm.name: Label (optional)
evo_alarm.text: Optional custom message. If none is given then the threshold and duration will be used.

reconfirmation.check_email: Thank you. If we recognise this address then a new confirmation message will be sent. Please allow a few minutes for it to arrive, and keep an eye on your spam folder. The message will appear to come from robot@siss.io.

requirements.period: An active period requires a schedule and at least one map zone before it can be published.
requirements.team_period: Period requires a schedule and at least one map zone.

reset.check_email: Thank you. If we recognise this address then reset instructions will be sent. Please allow a few minutes for them to arrive, and keep an eye on your spam folder. The message will appear to come from robot@siss.io.
reset.link_incorrect: Sorry: this reset link does not seem to be correct. Have you already used this token? You can always request another one. Otherwise, please check your email and make sure you're getting the whole link.
reset.failure: Sorry: we don't recognise that email address.

descriptions.admin: can perform all actions in this app, including configuration through the app dashboard.
descriptions.command_communicator: can observe and send messages to command users.
descriptions.command_manager: can observe, instruct and create command users.
descriptions.command_observer: can observe the locations of command users.
descriptions.crowdmap_manager: can configure recording sessions and also play them in the map.
descriptions.crowdmap_observer: can play past or present crowdmap sessions.
descriptions.developer: can see all account content except finance, and is able to set advanced app properties and review dispatch status.
descriptions.finance: can set account billing properties and review invoices from the dashboard, but cannot affect other settings or app content.
descriptions.mapping_editor: can create but not publish POIs, routes and areas on the map.
descriptions.mapping_publisher: can create and publish POIs, routes and areas on the map.
descriptions.message_composer: can create but not send messages, with or without locations.
descriptions.message_publisher: can create and send messages, with optional push notification if enabled.
descriptions.sis_finance: can see financial information in all accounts but cannot affect other content.

scheduler.leave_blank_to_repeat: Leave blank to repeat every day
scheduler.no_schedule: No schedule is defined, so this is always available.

status.account_suspended: This account has been suspended due to

user_status.unconfirmed: User has not responded to invitation

waiters.checking_token: Please wait while we check your confirmation token.
waiters.generating_certificates: Generating certificates and keys for the new app. Please wait.
